Amos__05.5__But seek not Bethel: : Bethel, Galgal, Bersabee: the places where they worshipped their idols.
Amos__05.8__Arcturus and Orion: : Arcturus is a bright star in the north: Orion a beautiful constellation in the south.
Amos__05.9__With a smile: : That is, with all ease, and without making any effort.
Amos__05.25__Did you offer: : Except the sacrifices that were offered at the first, in the dedication of the tabernacle, the Israelites offered no sacrifices in the desert.
Amos__05.26__A tabernacle: : All this alludes to the idolatry which they committed, when they were drawn away by the daughters of Moab to the worship of their gods. Num. 25.
